#summary Console command: profiler
#labels console

= Profile control =

Control the profiler.

== Syntax ==

{{{
profiler on|off|dump|reset
}}}

Where:

 * on      Turn on the profiler and start recording
 * off     Turn off the profiler and stop recording
 * dump    Dump profiler's data
 * reset   Reset profiler's data

== Example ==

{{{
> profiler on
> profiler dump
}}}

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
